content: Consolidated revenues for the quarter ended December 31, 2022, decreased by $2.7 million to $47.2 million when compared to the same period in the prior year. Net income attributable to Reading International for the quarter ended December 31, 2022, decreased by $13.6 million to a net loss of $13.2 million when compared to the same period in the prior year. For the year ended December 31, 2022, net income attributable to Reading decreased by $68.1 million to a net loss of $36.2 million compared to the same period in the prior year. Non-segment G&A expense for the quarter ended December 31, 2022, and the year ended December 31, 2021, decreased by $1.7 million and $0.4 million to $3 million and $16.2 million, respectively, compared to the same period in prior year. We experienced an income tax expense of $0.8 million for the year ended December 31, 2022, a decrease of $5.1 million when compared to the same period of prior year. For the year ended December 31, 2022, our adjusted EBITDA decreased by $74.3 million to a loss of $55,000 compared to the year ended December 31, 2021. For the year ended December 31, 2022, net cash used in operating activities increased by $12.9 million to net cash used of $26.4 million when compared to the same prior year period.
